title: Mobile phone usage : frequency of making mobile phone calls in the UK 2019 , by gender
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Response Several times a day had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Male. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Never for Male.
Response Several times a day and Never had the biggest gap of 48.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Male.
Averaging all 2 groups Male, and Female, the Response Several times a day is the maximum Share of respondents and Never is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 7 different Responses for 2 groups Male, and Female that are presented on the X-axis.
For Response Several times a day, Male had the highest Share of respondents 49.0 among the 2 groups and in Never, Male had the lowest Share of respondents 1.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Response Several times a day had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Male. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Never for Male.
Response Several times a day and Never had the biggest gap of 48.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Male.
Averaging all 2 groups Male, and Female, the Response Several times a day is the maximum Share of respondents and Never is the minimum Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Male had the highest Share of respondents for Response Several times a day and Male had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Never.
Among all the Responses, Male had the highest Share of respondents 49.0 in Response Several times a day and lowest value 1.0 in Response Never.
There is a gap of 48.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Male in Response Several times a day and Never.
Among the groups, Male had the biggest difference in Share of respondents. Where the maximum Share of respondents was 49.0 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents.
On average, the Response Several times a day had the highest Share of respondents for all 2 groups Male, and Female. Whereas Never had the lowest average Share of respondents.
